What is it with you "all or none" people?  Maybe they DO drive but they use an electric car rather than a gas guzzling SUV.  Or maybe they ride bikes, who knows.  Why is it you believe people who recognize the obvious dangers of AGW should simply cease all emissions of anything carbon less they are deemed a hypocrite?  I got news for you, K, I believe in a low sugar diet yet...wait for it...I do eat sugar sometimes.  I also believe in a low fat diet yet...I eat fat sometimes.  So why is believing in a low carbon economy any different?  We all know we are going to be zero carbon emitters anytime soon.

Let me throw something back at you.  Following your "logic," if you do NOT "believe" in the scientific evidence that overwhelmingly supports AGW then YOU should stop using ANYTHING that science has produced for you.  Goodbye modern medicine, any electronics, and yes, sadly, your car.  Have fun with that, Koncerned.  Bottom line: Quit with the "all or none lest be a hypocrite mentality."
